flavor_text_entries.red:
Thickly covered
with a filthy,
vile sludge. It is so toxic, even
its footprints
contain poison.
flavor_text_entries.blue:
Thickly covered
with a filthy,
vile sludge. It is so toxic, even
its footprints
contain poison.
flavor_text_entries.yellow:
Smells so awful,
it can cause
fainting. Through degeneration, it
lost its sense of
smell.
flavor_text_entries.gold:
They love to gath­
er in smelly areas
where sludge ac­ cumulates, making
the stench around
them worse.
flavor_text_entries.silver:
Its body is made
of a powerful poi­
son. Touching it accidentally will
cause a fever that
requires bed rest.
flavor_text_entries.crystal:
As it moves, a
very strong poison
leaks from it, making the ground
there barren for
three years.
flavor_text_entries.ruby:
From MUK’s body seeps a foul fluid that
gives off a nose-bendingly horrible
stench. Just one drop of this POKéMON’s body
fluid can turn a pool stagnant and
rancid.
flavor_text_entries.sapphire:
This POKéMON’s favorite food is
anything that is repugnantly filthy.
In dirty towns where people think nothing of throwing away litter on the
streets, MUK are certain to gather.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
It prefers warm and humid habitats.
In the summertime, the toxic substances
in its body intensify, making MUK reek like
putrid kitchen garbage.
flavor_text_entries.firered:
It is usually undetectable because it
blends in with the ground. Touching it can
cause terrible poisoning.
flavor_text_entries.leafgreen:
Thickly covered with a filthy, vile
sludge. It is so toxic, even its footprints
contain poison.
flavor_text_entries.diamond:
A toxic fluid seeps from its body.
The fluid instantly kills plants and
trees on contact.
flavor_text_entries.pearl:
A toxic fluid seeps from its body.
The fluid instantly kills plants and
trees on contact.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
A toxic fluid seeps from its body.
The fluid instantly kills plants and
trees on contact.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold:
They love to gather in smelly areas
where sludge accumulates, making
the stench around them worse.
flavor_text_entries.soulsilver:
Its body is made of a powerful poison.
Touching it accidentally will
cause a fever that requires bed rest.
flavor_text_entries.black:
A toxic fluid seeps from its body.
The fluid instantly kills plants and
trees on contact.
flavor_text_entries.white:
A toxic fluid seeps from its body.
The fluid instantly kills plants and
trees on contact.
flavor_text_entries.black-2:
It’s so stinky! Muk’s body contains
toxic elements, and any plant will
wilt when it passes by.
flavor_text_entries.white-2:
It’s so stinky! Muk’s body contains
toxic elements, and any plant will
wilt when it passes by.
flavor_text_entries.x:
They love to gather in smelly areas where sludge
accumulates, making the stench around
them worse.
flavor_text_entries.y:
A toxic fluid seeps from its body. The fluid instantly
kills plants and trees on contact.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
From Muk’s body seeps a foul fluid that gives off a
nose-bendingly horrible stench. Just one drop of this
Pokémon’s body fluid can turn a pool stagnant and rancid.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
This Pokémon’s favorite food is anything that is repugnantly
filthy. In dirty towns where people think nothing of throwing
away litter on the streets, Muk are certain to gather.
flavor_text_entries.sun:
The stench it gives off will make your nose
scrunch up. Still, there are Muk fans who think
that’s a good thing.
flavor_text_entries.moon:
After recent environmental improvements, this
Pokémon is now hardly seen at all. People
speculate that it may go extinct at some point.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun:
Their food sources have decreased, and their
numbers have declined sharply. Sludge ponds
are being built to prevent their extinction.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-moon:
Because they scatter germs everywhere,
they’ve long been targeted for extermination,
leading to a steep decline in their population.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu:
Smells so awful, it can cause fainting.
Through degeneration of its nose,
it lost its sense of smell.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-eevee:
Smells so awful, it can cause fainting.
Through degeneration of its nose,
it lost its sense of smell.
